category: news
title: "Advertisers urged to disclose AI use in social media campaigns"
excerpt: "WPP-backed advertising agency Ogilvy — one of the largest agencies for social media influencers — has set out plans for an AI accountability code for advertisers and social media platforms to clearly disclose and publicly declare AI-generated influencer campaigns. The agency has also committed to using a new AI “watermark” on its advertising."
